options: ['Improving human rights around the world should be one of (survey country)’s most important foreign policy goals', 'Having a close relationship to the United States', 'If (survey country) had cooperated more with other countries, the number of coronavirus cases would have been lower in this country', 'Many of the problems facing our country can be solved by working with other countries', 'Improving human rights is important, but many other foreign policy goals should be more important', 'Having a close relationship to Russia', 'No amount of cooperation between (survey country) and other countries would have reduced the number of coronavirus cases in this country', 'Few of the problems facing our country can be solved by working with other countries', 'DK/Refused', 'Improving human rights around the world should not be an important foreign policy goal for (survey country)', 'Both relationships are equally important (DO NOT READ)', 'None of the above (VOL)', 'Neither (DO NOT READ)', 'When dealing with major international issues, our country should take into account the interests of other countries, even if it means making compromises with them', 'When dealing with major international issues, our country should follow its own interests, even when other countries strongly disagree', 'The U.S. should try to promote human rights in China, even if it harms economic relations with China', 'The U.S. should prioritize strengthening economic relations with China, even if it means not addressing human rights issues']
answer_us: Many of the problems facing our country can be solved by working with other countries
answer_uk: When dealing with major international issues, our country should take into account the interests of other countries, even if it means making compromises with them
model_answer_us: Improving human rights around the world should be one of (survey country)'s most important foreign policy goals.

question: Here is a list of groups, organizations and institutions. For each, please tell me what kind of influence the group is having on the way things are going in our country.  Is the influence of our national government very good, somewhat good, somewhat bad or very bad in our country?
options: ['Very good', 'Somewhat good', 'Somewhat bad', 'Very bad']

question: Do you think sharing similar food preferences strengthens a relationship?
answer_us: It can help, but it's more about respect and understanding each other's choices.
